title: A Mysterious Letter
description:
You get a letter in the mail asking you to call. You don’t know the person who sent it. What would you do? When Nikki gets one of those letters, she follows her curiosity to a surprising end.

Learn more about JFI Productions

Follow Just Fix It Productions on Instagram and Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
